isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - INSTALL - HEADLINER TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Headliner Trim Panel on Standard Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 109
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place headliner trim panel (Item 7) inside cab. Position headliner trim panel in behind passenger and driver side side and corner interior trim panels (Items 3 and 5).

Hold the front of the headliner trim panel (Item 7) up at the center of the headliner trim panel above windshield and install push-in fastener (Item 13) through headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Position headliner trim panel (Item 7) above driver side door opening and install push-in fastener (Item 12) through headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Position headliner trim panel (Item 7) above passenger side door opening and install push-in fastener (Item 11) through headliner trim panel into the cab header.

Install two push-in fasteners (Item 4) at the top of driver side corner interior trim panel (Item 5) through driver side side and corner interior trim panel and headliner trim panel into the cab header.

Install two push-in fasteners (Item 2) at the top of passenger side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 3) through passenger side corner interior trim panel and headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Install two push-in fasteners (Item 6) into back of headliner trim panel (Item 7) through headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Install coat hook (Item 8) into back of headliner trim panel (Item 7) until it snaps into place and close cover (Item 9).

Install header console panel, refer to HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Headliner Trim Panel on Extended Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 110
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place front headliner trim panel (Item 3) inside cab. Position the front of front headliner trim panel at the windshield. Slide the rear edge of front headliner trim panel in between cab roof and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11).

Hold the front of the front headliner trim panel (Item 3) up at the center of the front headliner trim panel above windshield and install push-in fastener (Item 10) through front headliner trim panel into the cab header.

Align mounting holes of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) with front headliner trim panel (Item 3) and install five push-in fastener (Item 9) through rear headliner trim panel and front headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 7) through the front mounting hole of driver side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 8) and front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 6) above driver side door opening through front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 4) through the front mounting hole of passenger side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 5) and front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 2) above passenger side door opening through front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.

Install header console panel, refer to HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Headliner Trim Panel on Extended Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 110
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) inside cab. Hold rear headliner trim panel up to cab roof and connect electrical connector into courtesy light (Item 18).

While holding rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) up to the cab roof. Slide rear headliner trim panel rearward and carefully slide it between both passenger and driver side side and corner interior trim panels (Items 5 and 8) and cab roof.

Align mounting holes of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) with front headliner trim panel (Item 3) and install five push-in fastener (Item 9) through rear headliner trim panel and front headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Install coat hook (Item 15) into the opening at the back of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) until it snaps into place and close cover (Item 16).
Install two push-in fasteners (Item 14) through the back of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header.
Install four push-in fasteners (Item 7 and 13) through the mounting holes of driver side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 8) and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header.
Install four push-in fasteners (Item 4 and 12) through the mounting holes of passenger side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 5) and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header.

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Headliner Trim Panel on Crew Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 111
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place front headliner trim panel (Item 3) inside cab. Position the front of front headliner trim panel at the windshield. Position right and left side of front headliner trim panel between cab roof and passenger and drive side B - pillar trim panels (Items 5 and 8). Slide the rear edge of front headliner trim panel in between cab roof and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11).

Hold the front of the front headliner trim panel (Item 3) up at the center of the front headliner trim panel above windshield and install push-in fastener (Item 10) through front headliner trim panel into the cab header.

Align mounting holes of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) with front headliner trim panel (Item 3) and install five push-in fastener (Item 9) through rear headliner trim panel and front headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 7) through the front mounting hole of driver side B - pillar trim panel (Item 8) and front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 6) above driver side door opening through front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 4) through the front mounting hole of passenger side B - pillar trim panel (Item 5) and front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.
Install push-in fastener (Item 2) above passenger side door opening through front headliner trim panel (Item 3) into the cab header.

Install header console panel, refer to HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Headliner Trim Panel on Crew Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 111
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) inside cab. Hold rear headliner trim panel up to cab roof and connect electrical connector into courtesy light (Item 23).

While holding rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) up to the cab roof. Position right and left side of front headliner trim panel between cab roof and passenger and drive side B - pillar trim panels (Items 5 and 8). Slide rear headliner trim panel rearward and carefully slide it between both passenger and driver side side and corner interior trim panels (Items 14 and 17) and cab roof.
Install two push-in fasteners (Item 22) through rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header just to the rear of courtesy light (Item 23).

Align mounting holes of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) with front headliner trim panel (Item 3) and install five push-in fastener (Item 9) through rear headliner trim panel and front headliner trim panel into the cab header.
Install two push-in fasteners (Item 21) through the back of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header.
Install coat hook (Item 18) into the opening at the back of rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) until it snaps into place and close cover (Item 19).

Install two push-in fasteners (Item 16) through the mounting holes of driver side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 17) and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header in the back corner.
Install push-in fastener (Item 15) through the rear mounting hole of driver side B - pillar trim panel (Item 8) and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header.

Install two push-in fasteners (Item 13) through the mounting holes of passenger side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 14) and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header in the back corner.
Install push-in fastener (Item 12) through the rear mounting hole of passenger side B - pillar trim panel (Item 5) and rear headliner trim panel (Item 11) into the cab header.
